Table Summary

Source: R/model_table.R, R/model_table_regression.R
model_table.Rd

Create a reportable table (no pun intended) for your model.

model_table(model, ...)

# S3 method for lm
model_table(model, ...)

Arguments

model

A statistical model.
...

Arguments passed to or from other methods. For instance, when bootstrap = TRUE, arguments like ci_method are passed down to describe_posterior.

Examples

model <- lm(Sepal.Length ~ Petal.Width, data = iris)
model_table(model)
#> Parameter   | Coefficient |   SE | CI_low | CI_high |     t | df_error |    p | Std_Coefficient |    Fit
#> --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> (Intercept) |        4.78 | 0.07 |   4.63 |    4.92 | 65.51 |      148 | 0.00 |            0.00 |       
#> Petal.Width |        0.89 | 0.05 |   0.79 |    0.99 | 17.30 |      148 | 0.00 |            0.82 |       
#>             |             |      |        |         |       |          |      |                 |       
#> AIC         |             |      |        |         |       |          |      |                 | 208.22
#> BIC         |             |      |        |         |       |          |      |                 | 217.25
#> R2          |             |      |        |         |       |          |      |                 |   0.67
#> R2 (adj.)   |             |      |        |         |       |          |      |                 |   0.67
#> RMSE        |             |      |        |         |       |          |      |                 |   0.47
summary(model_table(model))
#> Parameter   | Coefficient | CI_low | CI_high |    p | Std_Coefficient |  Fit
#> ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> (Intercept) |        4.78 |   4.63 |    4.92 | 0.00 |            0.00 |     
#> Petal.Width |        0.89 |   0.79 |    0.99 | 0.00 |            0.82 |     
#>             |             |        |         |      |                 |     
#> R2          |             |        |         |      |                 | 0.67
#> R2 (adj.)   |             |        |         |      |                 | 0.67

model <- t.test(Sepal.Length ~ Species, data = iris[1:100, ])
model_table(model)
#> Parameter    |   Group | Mean_Group1 | Mean_Group2 | Difference |      t |    df |    p | CI_low | CI_high |                  Method | Cohens_d
#> -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> Sepal.Length | Species |        5.01 |        5.94 |       0.93 | -10.52 | 86.54 | 0.00 |  -1.11 |   -0.75 | Welch Two Sample t-test |    -2.26
summary(model_table(model))
#> Difference |      t |    df |    p | CI_low | CI_high | Cohens_d
#> ----------------------------------------------------------------
#>       0.93 | -10.52 | 86.54 | 0.00 |  -1.11 |   -0.75 |    -2.26
